TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that activates some types of immune system cells, and is being studied as a treatment for cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called biological therapy agents.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia que activa algunos tipos de células inmunitarias y que está en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Es un tipo de medicamento usado en la terapia biológica.
